rules_text:
When this enchantment enters, exile the top card of your library. If it's a nonland card, you may cast it until the end of your next turn.
{R}, Sacrifice this enchantment: Exile the top card of your library. If it's a nonland card, you may cast it until the end of your next turn.
flavor_text: [i]“We woke up its bones! Our fear is its flesh!”[/i]
